BillTitle: An Act respecting immigration to Canada and the granting of refugee protection to persons who are displaced, persecuted or in danger
Information:
Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby fixes December 6, 2001, as the day on which sections 1 and 4 of that Act come into force.



SI/2001-119




Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby fixes June 28, 2002 as the day on which the following provisions of the Act come into force:

(a) sections 2 and 3;

(b) sections 5 to 72;

(c) sections 74 to 109;

(d) sections 112 to 170;

(e) sections 172 to 193;

(f) sections 196 to 244; and

(g) sections 246 to 274.


SI/2002-97

His Excellency the Governor General in Council fixes December 15, 2012 as the day on which sections 73, 110, 111, 171, 194 and 195 of that Act come into force.
SI/2012-94
Committee: Standing Senate Committee on Social Affairs, Science and Technology
